product_name: REI Revelcloud Junior Jacket - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The toddler boys' REI Revelcloud Junior Jacket offers the same advanced PrimaLoft fill as our adult Revelcloud jackets, so little ones can enjoy warmth without a lot of bulk. Warm PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation is sleek, lightweight and water resistant. Soft yet durable recycled polyester shell is wind resistant up to 45 mph and has a durable water repellent finish to repel light moisture and stains. Elastic at sleeve cuffs and jacket hem seals out cold. Front zipper has a full-length stormflap and a chin guard; tall collar extends warmth and coverage. Jacket features a write-on ID label inside. The toddler boys' REI Revelcloud Junior Jacket includes 2 open handwarmer pockets.
